name: Oubliette (itch) (TeamAMF)
description:
Oubliette is an Epic puzzle challenge set in a Medieval Castle Tower.

I have spent several months developing this game and it is very close to final release.

Now in Open Beta 2.1 - Please download it, beat on it, and give input in the Team AMF Games Reddit linked in our profile.

Oubliette includes dark comedy and Haunted House style light horror and the amazing visuals, graphic & FX available only in Unreal Engine.

You must escape the Tower, Down through several levels of puzzles. Pass through the dungeons; the Pit, the Crypt, then jump, climb and crawl through dark echoing tunnels while avoiding the Monsters then make your way across a yawning chasm and back up through a wind swept Ancient Bay to finally escape.

I actually removed a few levels in the middle to keep the file below 3 Gigs. It's a big one due to the amazing 4k textures and 3-D FX.

It's a massive challenge and AFAIK no one, including me, has completed it in one life, or even one sitting. Play time is estimated at 3 hours minimum.

Can you beat me?

Ed
